column4: I-75S just past the Clays Ferry Bridge
column5: At least one lane is blocked.

column4: I-75 at the Clays Ferry Bridge
column5: State salt trucks are enroute due to black ice.  Use added caution if traveling in this area.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
